string.text:
An old gun rack that can be used to collect and display your favorite rifles and shotguns.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Displays Rifles, Submachine-guns and Shotguns

An old shelf that can be used to show off your favorite handguns.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Displays Pistols
